title: Samsung March 2022 security update is now rolling out for these Galaxy devices
content:
Samsung is now rolling out the latest March 2022 Android security update, including One UI 4.1 for some devices, to its massive lineup of Galaxy devices.

description: Samsung is now rolling out the latest March 2022 Android security update, including One UI 4.1 for some, to its lineup of Galaxy devices.
